name: OverCharge - [GMTK Game Jam]
description:
Over ChargeTurn on the volume

Over Charge is way better with your sound turned on as the environment react to it!

Don't go for to much power

The core is very instable, do not let the red orbs power it more than it is! 

Create energy links to shield yourself and survive at all cost. 

How to play

You can spawn Link Orbs in order to create **Energy Links** (link orbs must be near enough). You can spawn up to 3 link orbs at the same time, if you spawn a fourth, the previous 3 will disapears. 

If a Red Orb touche an energy link, it explodes and charge up your shockvawe power.

Controls
  • Right Mouse Button: Spawn Link Orb
  • Left Mouse Button: Clear all Link Orbs
  • Space Bar: Use Shockwave to destroy all visible red orbs
  • CTRL: Next music
  • P: Pause the game / access to options

ENJOY EVERYONE AND GOOD LUCK
